title: Rajnath Singh met President of All India Muslim Personal Law Board to offer condolences on the death of his brother
subtitle: This is the photo of Rajnath Singh meeting All India Muslim Personal Law Board President Maulana Rabey Hassan Nadvi to offer condolences on the death of his brother.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A few Facebook users are sharing a post with the image of Rajnath Singh alleging that he has visited a Madarsa to seek Muslim votes. Let’s try to analyze the claims made in the post

Fact: This photo is of Rajnath Singh offering condolences on the death of the All India Muslim Personal Law Board (AIMPLB) President’s brother. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When the image in the post is run through Google Reverse Image Search technique, it was found in the tweet of Uttar Pradesh’s Deputy Chief Minister Dinesh Sharma. Earlier this year, Rajnath Singh has met All India Muslim Personal Law Board President Maulana Rabey Hassan Nadvi to offer condolences on the death of his younger brother Maulana Wajeh Hassan Nadvi. The photo taken in this context is being falsely shared with the narrative of Rajnath Singh visiting a Madrasa to seek the votes of Muslims.

Hence, this is the photo of Rajnath Singh meeting All India Muslim Personal Law Board President Maulana Rabey Hassan Nadvi to offer condolences on the death of his brother.
